適應症: 手術前後、灼傷、腎病、嚴重之營養不良及蛋白質缺乏症
主成分略述: NITROGEN, XYLITOL, L-ALANINE, L-ARGININE, GLUTAMIC ACID L-, L-HISTIDINE, L-ISOLEUCINE, L-LEUCINE, LYSINE L-, L-METHIONINE, ORNITHINE L- ASPARTATE L-, L-PHENYLALANINE, L-PROLINE, L-SERINE, L-THREONINE, L-TRYPTOPHAN, L-VALINE, GLYCINE (EQ TO AMINOACETIC ACID)(EQ TO GLYCOCOLL), ACETATE, CHLORIDE ION, MAGNESIUM ION, POTASSIUM ION, SODIUM ION, MALIC ACID
